dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5186 IH: Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Dingell (for herself and Mr. Johnson of South Dakota) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to reauthorize the voluntary public access and habitat incentive program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2023.

section.header: Voluntary public access and habitat incentive program
section.text: Section 1240R(f)(1) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3839bb–5(f)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting , and $150,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2024 through 2028 before the period at the end.
